name: V1_Ch10_GenesisTransition_ChapterAxiom
intent: Define the transition from static primitives to dynamically evolving semantic structures, setting the stage for Volume II.

domain.initial_state: Library of primitives: operators, values, geometric entities, domain structures, invariants.
domain.output: Admissible evolving configurations capable of forming FSMs in Volume II.

constraints.consistency: All transitions must respect Volume I invariants.
constraints.non_triviality: Genesis transition must yield non-trivial dynamical behavior (not all states collapse to 0).
constraints.Ω_guard: Ω validates that the emerging dynamics are globally admissible.

cross_links.volume2_fsm: FSM definitions in V2_Ch1 begin immediately after this transition.
cross_links.transition_pack: Vol2→Vol3 pack logically extends the Genesis mechanism.
